output.analysis:
Analyzing the post according to the required criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240003 and CMF 31240004 are present, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidates: Yes - Mentions Marcel Ciolacu (Position 3 - PSD) - Promotes Cristian-Vasile Terheș (Position 13 - PNCR) - Uses hashtags #TerhesPresedinte and tags Cristian Terheș
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - Paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram - Targets large audience (estimated 500,001-1,000,000 people) - Addresses Diaspora and general Romanian population
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Uses presidential campaign hashtag #alegeriprezidentiale2024 - Clearly promotes Terheș while criticizing other candidates - Attempts to influence voter opinion by criticizing PSD and AUR while promoting PNCR
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content but rather campaign messaging - Contains political accusations and campaign rhetoric
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured, paid political message - Contains CMF numbers indicating official campaign material

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: 1. Contains official CMF numbers 2. Directly promotes a presidential candidate while attacking others 3. Is a paid advertisement targeting a large audience 4. Has clear electoral objectives 5. Uses campaign hashtags and mentions
conclusion.message-for-police: TOHANEANU NICOLAE-VLADUT PERSOANA FIZICA AUTORIZATA, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea cu ID-ul 1255773598984272 reprezinta propaganda electorala evidenta, continand numere CMF (11240003 si 31240004), promovand direct candidatul Cristian-Vasile Terheș prin hashtag-ul #TerhesPresedinte si atacand contracandidati precum Marcel Ciolacu. Postarea este platita si targetata catre un public larg (500,001-1,000,000 persoane), cu scop electoral explicit, utilizand hashtag-ul #alegeriprezidentiale2024, reprezentand astfel o incercare clara de influentare a votului in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
